text: And because of the word, Achaab was pierced with sorrow 20. 27 Gr. the face, as it were, of the Lord.before the Lord, and he both went weeping, and rent his garment, and girt sackcloth upon his body, and fasted; he put on sackcloth also in the day that he smote Nabuthai the Jezraelite, and went his way.
